website_summaries.verdict: For a wire-free, non-padded strapless bra experience, this popular and cost-effective model provides silky-smooth support in a variety of color options.
pros: Grips well and doesn't slip, even with fuller-busted women
Fits B-, C-, and D-cup sizes, so can order by band size
Not uncomfortable or scratchy like boned, wired strapless bras
Users are so pleased by the fit that they buy one in every color
cons: Since there's no padding, will not provide much coverage under sheer clothing
Some users have had to return and order a size up

customer_reviews.title: Big bust APPROVED!! 34DDDc
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 34DDD And after reading reviews I ordered at “36” and it’s PERFECT!! It has 6 clasps on the back so it is snug. I jumped up and down moved my arms up and down and I didn’t move. I love this bra. There’s no padding at all so if your shirts are sheer you’ll show nips if you’re nippin, good thing the 90s are back and that’s kinda a thing now so I’m not too worried about it!! Love his bra, I’m buying more colors now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS & I'm a fluffy big busted girl!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a problem with slippy, slidey, itchey, pokey, non-supportive underthings that make you look like a sausage casing...THIS Strapless is SUPREME! I ride a motorcycle and wanted to wear a string top and after reading the other reviews bought one and this REIGNS SUPREME! My hoots stayed perfectly in place, did not jiggle, bop, droop, slide-out, pop-out, swing, sway, do the hokey pokey or give me black eyes! Love this so much, I bought all 3 colors! You will not be disappointed. Bought my exact size. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie St James

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable,  light support even for curvier gals
customer_reviews.text: I'm a completely natural 36DDD so I wasn't sure this would work for me, but I ordered a size 40 and it fits surprisingly well. I wouldn't wear it for jumping rope or anything, but for normal use when a strapless bra is needed, this will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: jhoustee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stays in place
customer_reviews.text: I got this to hide cleavage under a dress, and I'm happy with it. It's very comfortable and stays in place. I typically wear a 36 D bra and the size 36 fit me perfectly. The material is nice but slightly slightly opaque, so if you have darker nipples they might be visible without another layer on top. It's soft all around and the lace isn't scratchy. There's gripping bands on the top and bottom to help it stay in place, and those are comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This bra is surprisingly comfortable considering the job it has to do. I'm a 44D and I ordered the largest size and it keeps everything in place! Yeah, I've got kind of a uni-boob and the girls aren't exactly perky, but I'm just impressed that it holds everything up! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Penguin77

customer_reviews.title: the most comfortable strapless I have ever tried on - it stays ...
customer_reviews.text: the most comfortable strapless I have ever tried on - it stays put and does not move. I have not washed it yet and that is the only reason I did not give it a 5 star - I will update this review once that happens. As with all strapless bras it does not have any lift and the top of the bra pushes everything down a little and with a tight tank on you can see the lines.
customer_reviews.author: scubagirl65

customer_reviews.title: These are not made for boobs. Breast maybe, but not boobs
customer_reviews.text: If you have titties, don’t by this. I wear a 36 DDD and based on a few of the reviews, I decided to give this a chance. Prayer, hope, nor good intentions along with this bra could hold up my breast. And I shoulda known better since there’s no type of support, except for elastic. So, if you’re reading this and also read some reviews from women who say they have titties and this works perfectly, don’t listen to them. They may have breast, which aren’t affected by gravity. But if your titties/boobs require structure to get through the day, this ain’t the bra for you. Honestly, if this bra works for you, you don’t even need a bra.
customer_reviews.author: Ayanna C. Dookie

customer_reviews.title: ... have big breast (36DD) and this bra gives me great support, and also covers my cleavage
customer_reviews.text: I have big breast (36DD) and this bra gives me great support, and also covers my cleavage. I'm going to order it in different colors!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: It’s good.
customer_reviews.text: I mean it serves its purpose. My fat is overflowing..but I’m not too worried cuz I have an off the shoulder top..so it’ll be fine. Like it fits..it’s snug but not uncomfortable. There’s absolutely no support lol, so if that’s what you are expecting, don’t. No padding either. All in all great purchase and worth the $$$
customer_reviews.author: alyssa myers

customer_reviews.title: Not if you have a large bust...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 38DDD and this just did nothing. It created a saggy uni-boob effect. No bra would have been more attractive than the shape this created. I’m guessing it’s a wonderful garment for women who’ve been blessed with a small bust, but for anyone with an unfortunately large bust, it just makes an unattractive situation worse.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Going to buy another one in black!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra, the only downside was its not padded. But otherwise, its the first strapless bra Ive had that I didnt spend most of my time pulling it up. We went on a trip to Central Park and it was a bit hot and humid and its nice the bra held up and didnt irritate me. Put it on wash and dryer as usual and it held up beautifully. Pls make another one with padding? 🤓
customer_reviews.author: Luchi

customer_reviews.title: Great bra for bigger sizes too!
customer_reviews.text: So I read over all the reviews and was concerned about ordering this bra because of all the other reviewers that gave this products such a low grade. I was very excited and nervous to try on. I'm a 36D with dense breast tissue. Needless to say, I'm super excited that not only did it fit, it fit with comfort and the stitching is perfect! I love this bra so much I ordered it in blk too!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Anderson

customer_reviews.title: zero support
customer_reviews.text: returned this product immediately. the other reviews were mixed but there were several that did say it supported larger chested women. I think those larger chests were not natural breasts of mothers. I can see how it would be super comfortable as there was no difference in support in this bra than wearing a fitted tank top.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, casual wear bra
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a comfortable bra for working around the house without having straps or wires to bother with. This fit the bill. At first I thought it was a bit too snug, but within an hour I forgot I had it on. I was amazed that it stretched enough to accommodate my DD cups. It is supportive, does not give you a uniboob and is very comfortable. It certainly does not give you lift or cleavage for wearing with a dress or form-fitting top. I have found that occasionally I need to pull it up as the top rubber grip rolls down. Overall, I like it and would recommend for casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: This is the FIRST strapless bra that fits PERFECT and is comfortable - I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the FIRST strapless bra that fits PERFECT and is comfortable - I love it! It's pretty (looks nice), fits great and feels like it gives decent support (for a strapless bra). I plan on buying a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Vonda

customer_reviews.title: The 42 fit fine, so order a size up
customer_reviews.text: This product does run small - I am usually a 40 and I ordered a 42 because of other reviews. The 42 fit fine, so order a size up. Listing is for B/C/D cups - I am a D and it had ample coverage. The bra does stay in place and does not roll up. After 8 hours of wearing it did become uncomfortable around the elastic, but what bra doesn't? No lining or padding. Adequate support.
customer_reviews.author: #Hope2019

customer_reviews.title: The reason I chose "fit as expected" is because I ...
customer_reviews.text: The reason I chose "fit as expected" is because I expected not to hold and it didn't (like most strapless bras). This is not enough support for a 36 DD. The band did allow it to stay in place. However, it just gave me the same look as not wearing a bra at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkio

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST OUT THERE. I’VE TRIED EM ALL!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! I’m a 34 double D, and I worked in a lingerie department at you for years. This is by far the best and most comfortable/supportive strapless bra I’ve ever worn in my life. We didn’t sell these in stores but boy, they have been a huge hit if women just got to try these on in person. It stays up all on its own with silicone grips, and it’s wide enough to where it doesn’t roll or give you back fat. 10/10 would recommend over any wired, padded, unpadded strapless bras out there. I’ve tried them all, and this one gives great shape. Best part— is it doesn’t give that weird squished/flat breasts perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Katya Rozetka

customer_reviews.title: I was not expecting this bra to be as great as it is
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I was not expecting this bra to be as great as it is. I bought this bra to wear with a tube top dress that my other strapless bra just didn’t look right with. I didn’t think that this bra was going to provide much support, because it doesn’t have an underwire. It provides great support, and it stays in place. No slipping down. No constantly readjusting either. For reference, I’m a 34D. I went by the size chart, and I’m very pleased. Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Pretty impressive
customer_reviews.text: For a strapless bra, this one is great. It's a really snug fit, but that's how it should be. There are three hooks in the back and extra grip in the elastic that holds above the breast. For a bra with no boning, it does a good job of keeping things facing forward, though I still would have liked some more structure on the sides. For the price, though, it's pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: This bra was not up to the challenge
customer_reviews.text: Yeah....no! I am a 42DDD and this bra was no match for my womanly bosoms. I was not concerned about support because no bra this cheap can support all this greatness, but I just needed something to keep the girls in place while at a fundraiser. Overall, I would not recommend if you have been blessed with ample breasts.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia D.

customer_reviews.title: Not staying on. Don‘t recommend this bra
customer_reviews.text: Definitely need to buy a size up. I am a 36DD, bought a 38 and it fits. My problem is with the elastic on the top, it keeps flipping and folding over, finally after 30 minutes it started sliding down. There is no support which was expected from the reviews, I was hoping it could at least hold things in place and it can‘t even do that. I do not recommend this to anyone who is larger than a 32/34 A. Will return it.
customer_reviews.author: VR

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and pretty, does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is so comfortable and it hold You up well without showing any lines. I am not huge 34B, but I am uncomfortable without some support so this is perfect for me. It is also very very pretty. The small amount of lace can peek out without looking trashy and does not create lines under the garment when it should look smooth. I’m getting another, hope they cone in more colors, mine is blush.
customer_reviews.author: CookeT

customer_reviews.title: Glorified bralette
customer_reviews.text: I saw that this seems to run a bit small so I ordered a 40D when I typically wear a 38D and it fit great. But this does not provide as much lift and support as I thought. This is basically a glorified bralette in my opinion and for a pretty well endowed girl bralettes don't work too well at giving little if any support. The material is fine, not scratchy or anything and I think for smaller chested women this would work fine but I bought this to wear with a dress at a wedding and I don't know if I'd even feel comfortable wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: this one is quite comfortable. While it doesn't give great support
customer_reviews.text: As far as strapless bras go, this one is quite comfortable. While it doesn't give great support, it works well enough for summer dresses and tanks without having to readjust every few minutes. It is lightweight and breathable, which helps during the humid summer.
customer_reviews.author: SSZLC

customer_reviews.title: Total Waste 😡😡😡
customer_reviews.text: This is the WORST strapless bra I have ever owned. It does NOT hold ANYTHING. If you are a 32a it will work PERFRCT for you. HOWEVER, if you are ANYTHING above that be prepared for it to fit like a cotton tube top with absolutly NO support. It makes your girls sagg and it looks like one huge watermelon sitting in the middle of your chest because there is absolutely no support. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: CandyCurlz

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for B C or D cup sizes, white is really see-through
customer_reviews.text: Okay here's my info - I'm 5'5, around 205lbs, wear a 40DDD, shirts usually a xxL. I don't recall seeing any sizing for this but I did order the white 40 size bra and overall it fit pretty decent but was small, package recommended B C or D cup sizes. I wouldve been more happy if it wasnt really see-through and I also didnt like the little bow on the lace (stands out to me and looks like it shouldnt be there).
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Shanafelt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and stays put
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. I'm a 38F/G, so I didn't get this to wear by itself because it wouldn't be enough support for me, but rather I got it to wear over my bra/ under tops that show too much cleavage. It works perfectly. I ordered a 40 originally and it fit just fine and stays put, but then I ordered the other two colors in a 38 because I like things a little snug and I'm still losing weight, so hopefully it will fit longer. They look exactly like the picture and appear to be good quality. I hope they hold up long term because I love them, but if they don't, at this price who cares?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother! Doesn't stay up and your nips show
customer_reviews.text: NO WAY! This fits, but does not stay up on my 36D's. PLUS no padding at all, if you like your boobs sitting on our stomach and your nipples showing, be my guest. This is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: PHAC

customer_reviews.title: YES IT WORKS IN ALL THE RIGHT AREAS!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing strapless bra that I have ever owned! I am a 38 double d, and I never can find a strapless bra to hold me in place or the bra to stay up where it's supposed to! I am purchasing the other two colors, so that I now have a set of good & reliable strapless bras :) super comfortable, Airy for the summer (which is important as I live in the humid South with temperatures that can reach 110 degrees) it dries fast ....I could keep going on and on and on... it is a great bra :)
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Dantzler

customer_reviews.title: It's just not built for me.
customer_reviews.text: If you are a "perky" lady then this would be great for under-tank modesty. Not me, obviously- I shadow the moon. It fits great and all, but there is no support for ladies who have chests that are gravity-bound. It would need some strategically placed straps to make this appear better on me, which defeats the purpose. I may as well not wear a bra at all. It's not necessarily the product's fault- it's just not built for me.
customer_reviews.author: SweetDaesTop Contributor: My Little Pony

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold the girls for more than a couple hours
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for a couple hours, but I couldn't take it all day. I had to wear it tight to keep the girls up and not looking like 60 year old woman boobs. because of the tightness I couldn't wear it all day. There is also zero padding, so i wouldn't be able to wear this under a shirt that is smooth across the chest. Did the job for date night under a halter top, but i wouldn't use it for much more than that
customer_reviews.author: Leah Michelle

customer_reviews.title: SUPER itchy
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s terribly uncomfortable and itchy. I don’t think I’ll ever understand why some manufacturers put seems right down the middle so that unless you’re wearing a very thick shirt or dress, it looks as though your nipples are poking out. But really the worst part about it is how itchy it is.
customer_reviews.author: Emanderson

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: This strapless bra is very comfortable and stays in place all day, unfortunately it ripped on the third wear
customer_reviews.author: Reeba

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, keeps the girls securely contained
customer_reviews.text: I'm honestly astounded that this bra kept the girls contained when I tried it on & jumped around a whole bunch. Seemed wise to test its structural integrity before wearing it at work, or something. My 38D funbagz are well-secured & contained by this bra. The elastic around the edges felt slightly annoying at first, but after washing it on the delicate setting, it softened up a little & now I barely feel it at all. Would definitely recommend this to any boob-having person.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyddion Z.

customer_reviews.title: DDD 14/16 real review!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT LEISURE BRA!! I'm a natural DDD USA size 14/16 and have always had to wear under wire in a strapless bra. I did size up but think a 40 would have been fine for me. This bra is wire free, stretchy, with a wonderful full "no roll" back. There are little gripping strips around the bra's upper seam and it really helps slow down the inevitable pull of gravity! I would rate this bra 10 on comfort, 7.5 or 8 for support, and 7.5 for coverage. I layered this bra under a bandeau and I think it's good enough to wear out also. I'm ordering 2 more. SO COMFY!
customer_reviews.author: ncAmamzonWoman

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe it holds them up
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe someone managed to create a wireless, strapless, bandeau bra that works on large chests. Other bras like this I've tried leave my chest jiggling around like a bag of rabbits. If you're looking for a wired bra that gives more separation, try a Wacoal, but they're pricey and less comfortable. But if you want wireless, this is the only one I've found. It is a TINY bit too small in the band but honestly I don't care because it's working and I'm working on losing weight anyway. I'm going to be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable And Unsupportive
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what any of these reviews are talking about but this is not supportive at all. This isn’t a bra— it’s 2 elastics with a bit of fabric between them. A boob hammock, if you will. I’m 35 years old and a size 38C. Without straps or an underwire my breasts are way too low and move around too much. Shirts and dresses just don’t hang right on my body while wearing this. The fabric is cheap feeling and the lace is itchy. Won’t be keeping this one.
customer_reviews.author: barstr7

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wear underneath a low cut top or a dress
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I’m looking for to wear underneath a low cut top or a dress. I’m a breastfeeding mom, I wear a size 36, I ordered a size 36 and it fits perfectly. I wouldn’t wear it for jumping/running with it, but to wear when it’s needed, it offered enough support. I took one star off because I wish it would come with padding (it’s just a thin material, not padded at all). Love it n bought two in black n white, n would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Yesikha

customer_reviews.title: This is what I have been looking for like forever! Its difficult to find good fitting strapless ...
customer_reviews.text: This is what I have been looking for like forever! Its difficult to find good fitting strapless bras if you are big chested like I am, 34ddd. When I first saw this I was like "whatever" but the reviews I read prompted me to try one and I'm happy I did! Its thin not heavy, no chaffing just fits comfortably, I love it! Because I was not really sure about size and the reviews were saying order one size up I ordered a 36. It fits good yes but I think my size would fit perfect so i am going to order more in my regular size 34 Beautiful product.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not a lot of support for busty women
customer_reviews.text: I read through the reviews (so I knew it wasn't the best for support of bigger busts), and I bought this to wear for a bride's maids dress. It worked well for that purpose, as I needed a strapless bra. The dress had built-in support of sorts. However, if I were going to wear this with a tank top or something else, I'd probably wear layers. On the plus, it's crazy comfortable, and I can see wearing it around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny K.

customer_reviews.title: Product does roll down in the back
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a strapless bra for the warm weather to show my shoulders, but this is not it. Wearing this around the house to see if it could stand all of the movement I did of course I was sadly mistaken. The back started to roll down and didn't stay in place like the package stated. I had to return it back.
customer_reviews.author: KIMO

customer_reviews.title: Sadly does not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I can only guess those this works for are on the firm side. Looks pretty bad on me. Total sag. Fit is right but in order for it to work for me I would have to be frim. Oh well. After three kids not happening.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: a bra that stays up
customer_reviews.text: i bought this bra after having shoulder surgery since i didn't want any straps pressing on the surgery site. i bought a bandeau style that would not stay up, but this bra is wonderful for that. i think it works so well because the back is adjustable just like a regular bra. it is also pretty. no padding but fits snug enough to give some support. not crazy about the darts on each cup of the bra but would still highly recommend it. if you don't have the use of both hands you'll need some help fastening it. think this will be a great bra for those hot summer days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slips down
customer_reviews.text: I like it. A lot. But it slips down and exposes my breasts. Of course, I was wearing a dress over it. But I was in a gathering during a funeral and I didn't notice until after the eulogies, and I hope no one did either, because just thinking about it makes it super embarrassing. Imagine trying to hide and fix it before anyone notices. I think maybe I'll need some clear straps to keep it up.
customer_reviews.author: Mars B

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this. It looks nice but it’s not really useful. The quality is very good despite everything. It doesn’t have any support, the inside edges don’t have anti-slip so it constantly moves down. Just in general causes a uniboob.
customer_reviews.author: C.Yamada

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable bandeau but little support
customer_reviews.text: I had a super low cut blouse that I loved and recently bought but the neckline was too low for me. After giving up on sewing a higher neckline, I looked everywhere for a bra like this. I love that it has a clasp at the back. It is still pretty see through so if your shirt is made of a thinner material and doesn't have a lot of support, be careful of that. Otherwise, the silky material makes it a comfortable wear.
customer_reviews.author: Justyn

customer_reviews.title: little to no support
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable and soft bra but there is little or so support on its own. I bought it to wear over a strapless bra which works fine but on its own it literally bulls my boobs down. I rarely wear it on its own because it does nothing for me. Unless you have mosquito bites as breasts this isn't going to do much for you
customer_reviews.author: AudreyMal7

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: So I wasn’t sure what to expect for a strapless bra with no underwire. But I’m happy to report they actually fit great. And I have a lot to fill them up with. They didn’t look saggy or weird, it seem so I wasn’t sure what to expect for a strapless bra with no underwire. But I’m happy to report they actually fit great. And I have a lot to fill them up with!! They kept the girls high and not saggy or lumpy. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: rlbesq

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not very shapely!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this strapless bra to try it, I was expecting to have a bit more support under the cups, it really doesn't have any support and I am between a C & D cup, it does not create any shape , I knew I wouldn't wear them, and that's is why I returned both colors. I will continue to look at this brand to see if there's something else that would be strapless with more support. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Elsa G. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 36C. I purchased the 36 and it was so tight and absolutely crushed my chest.....looked absolutely horrendous.
customer_reviews.author: Andy K

customer_reviews.title: No padding
customer_reviews.text: No wired which is okey but no padding which is not alright.This is not advisable for women with big nipples. It will create scandal specially when you are wearing see through tops. Unless it's alright for women to be the center of attention because your tits is pointing through your tops /shirt or blouse then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Nagarn

customer_reviews.title: The perfect strapless bra! Doesn’t crush the girls! Buy it in every color!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect strapless bra! OMGosh...I’ve bought dozens of strapless bras and could never find one that is comfortable, non-slipping and doesn’t crush the girls into a sausage! This is the best strapless bra! For reference I am a size 38C. I ordered it in white and black and am now ordering the tan color as well. Great price, fit amp quality. Will never wear any other strapless-strangling uncomfortable bra again!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Jabotte

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought five different bras this week and finally gave in and ordered this one. I was a little concerned based on other reviews about the bras not having any support but I have yet to find a single strapless bra that really does. That being said, I have nursed three children and this thing does a pretty good job of lifting the girls. It's super comfortable and was at least ten dollars less than any of the others I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a comfy, "around the house" bra because I am a 38DD/36E and going braless just isn't an option for me 99% of my life. This bra is sooooo comfortable and gives me better support than other wireless bras I've tried. I'm bigger in the cup than the band in bras, but I got a 38 just in case it shrinks. For the price and the style, I am very happy with this bra!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this item
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. Material was scratchy and didnt offer anything in terms of support. Understanding this is a strapless bra I wasnt expecting wonders in the support department. I feel like it pulled my chest down leaving weird lines a d bulges where the straps were. It created an unflattering silhouette without even a flattening effect. Not worth it, returning it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Heichihua

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am a 38 DDD. I bought the 40 trying to compensate for my ample cup size. I didn't need to. I should have bought the 38. The 40 is fine and comfortable, but the 38 would have been a truer fit. I am finding myself adjusting every so often, but nothing that would stop me from buying this bra again.I would buy another. It looks nice and is of good quality. It is soft, smooth.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMarTay

customer_reviews.title: Only bandeau I can wear!
customer_reviews.text: Having larger breasts but a small rib cage, most bandeaus are simply not tight and big enough to do the trick. These are the only ones that accomplish both. I removed the little bow on the fron which I think makes it look cheaper and it really looks very nice and expensive from the front. The back with the big bra clasp does look a little granny bra-ish but not too noticeable. I bought this one and then went back and bought in all colors.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: The best strapless bra!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I never wore strapless bras till i got this one! I have 32J (implants) bought size 36 it’s a perfect fit! I am so happy i ordered one more in nude color! Now i feel like i wear no bra but look less explicit compared to no bra at all 😄 . Also it is really cute and good quality vs grandma full coverage bras they make for my size.
customer_reviews.author: Fairy

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable strapless bra
customer_reviews.text: This bra is more comfortable than other strapless bras I have tried. It has enough elastic to hold it up but it does not bind. I wore it all day and although it seemed like it was going to itch at first I honestly didn’t notice it as I did my activities. I am very small and found that my normal size worked fine. I wore it with a loose off the shoulder blouse so am not sure how it would look with a tighter dress or shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Needs more structure or something.............
customer_reviews.text: The band under the breasts disappeared and left a sagging appearance. If band would have stayed in place, I probably would have kept it. No support either and felt like it was falling down. Nice looking strapless but very soft, non-uplifting fabric. Definitely does not look like the picture. Will try something else; returned the next day.
customer_reviews.author: C. krenkel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too sure if I could trust a strapless bra, but I am happily surprised. The top of my right shoulder is temporarily too sensitive for the shoulder strap on my regular bras. This strapless bra is flattering, keeps everything where it's supposed to be, and doesn't loosen or bind over the course of my day.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Just don't move too much
customer_reviews.text: Bought a black strapless size 40, (5' 3", 203lb, typically size 38B) for comfort to hang out around the house and be outside for no tan lines. Fits great. Soft material. BUT there is rubberband material that goes around the top... How else is it going to stay up? It wasn't a bother until I started moving around... Little bit of gardening or throwing the ball for the dog. Immediate irritation and I'm constantly adjusting and fixing. Had I known, I would not have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay

customer_reviews.title: Not for real big breast
customer_reviews.text: If you have REAL DD+ breast and if you want them to drag on the floor, then buy this bra. Otherwise don't get this bra. I have zero support of my girls and even though the bra look cute, its worth it you are really top heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. C

customer_reviews.title: New favorite strapless bra! Works for large chests too!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a COMFORTABLE strapless bra that won’t feel like it’s cutting into you THIS IS IT!!! I’ve now worn it for two 10 hour days and didn’t even take it off when I got home because it’s so comfortable! I’m a 36DDD (post breastfeeding) and this is SO comfy and literally feels like I’m wearing nothing. It keeps my chest supported enough to wear all my cute off shoulder tops without the pain of a wired structured strapless bra. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SparklySprinkles

customer_reviews.title: Squished cone boobs
customer_reviews.text: My boobs might just be too large for this bra to work. Had to return it. I’m a 38G currently while pregnant and this bra fit me but squished my chest into a very unflattering cone like compressed shape. It was hysterically horrifying and needed to end as soon as it began. The bra itself seemed comfortable it just make my chest look awful.
customer_reviews.author: aect

customer_reviews.title: I'm 40 DD and size 40 fit very well.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase a strapless bra that seemed less substantially formed than others - but this bra was a pleasant surprise. I'm normally a 40 DD in bras - and am pretty broad; I purchased size 40 and it fit well, and does hold me very well. However there is a little overhang - so I think another cup size up would be perfect. So, I have ordered a size 42. Other than that the fabric is soft and the look is feminine - and I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JLT

customer_reviews.title: Too tight above breasts
customer_reviews.text: I am a 38C and wish I had purchased a size up. I followed the size chart and regret it. It's more obvious in person when I have both arms at my sides. I have this on the loosest hooks and it is comfortable around my rib cage, or "under bust" However, it digs in above the breasts, below the armpits. Looks better in my pictures.
customer_reviews.author: suburbiadaze

customer_reviews.title: I wore it yesterday it was comfortable, and it held me up pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I got the bra as scheduled. I had been looking for a strapless bra without underwire. After finding this I ordered. I wore it yesterday it was comfortable, and it held me up pretty good. I’m a c cup so lifting was not a big issue. I did have a little rolling but for the most part it stayed in place. I would have loved to have this bra with a little pad inside just to have good coverage because the bra itself is very thin. Because of this I would not wear with thin fabric because you would see everything. For the price it served its purpose for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Comfort....
customer_reviews.text: 42 B/C I've been ordering every wireless, strapless bra im done with underwire..... Ive ordered about 16 different bras in the last few weeks.. And i can tell you that ive finally found the right one for me! Im super happy. Its soft comfortable and perfect for my wide back and smaller breasts. Im 41 and i have breast feed 3 kids so i just want comfort! I will be ordering 3 of each color and probably get rid of all my other bras!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it fits
customer_reviews.text: I did get this on just fine. Used the old put on inside back in front, connect hooks and eyes and then turn it around and lift up. I didn't like how the front wanted to slip down. I am thinking of attaching clear straps to the bra so that I can wear it and get a little lift.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Took me a few days to get used to
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra. It took me a few days to adjust to it, as it has more structure and elastic than the stretchy tube bandeaus I've been wearing. I had to stop wearing regular bras because they were hurting my shoulders so much, but I can't go braless, so these are serving to make due. They don't uplift but they hold them down without smashing them too much and the bra feels secure all day.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have ordered, and I will more then likely order another just to have it. So comfortable. Being realistic though if your girls are a double D this is not going to work for you as there is not a lot of support, but if you are smaller chested it will make for a great bra for a strapless look
customer_reviews.author: Dawn J.

customer_reviews.title: ... where it is under a thinner shirt) but it's SUPER comfortable & I will wear it tons
customer_reviews.text: I am a DDD & honestly my only complaint is it does leave a bit of a weird crease (like you can see where it is under a thinner shirt) but it's SUPER comfortable & I will wear it tons! I was worried it wouldn't be very comfy due to my large breast size but needed something strapless for my clothing photo shoots. I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Pitty Mama

customer_reviews.title: Too tight!
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I expected. Mine was too tight and I could not reach the back to find out how it worked. I wanted one that was comfortable and fit the chart measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: 38DDD and purchased a size 40
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 38DDD and just in case I bought a 40. It does it’s job. I could compare this to a low impact sports bra. It holds up the girls and I like how the band is thick. Don’t buy this if you want something thatll bring the ladies up to your chin. It has no cups, padding or wiring. So if you want something to sculpt you like spandex, don’t buy this. Buy this if you need a simple straples if you want to wear under cute spaghetti strap tops
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: True to size but NO support and very thin
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this bra since it had a lot of good reviews but I can’t use this. I’m a 36c and though the bra is true to size, this bra literally just “covers” your boobs, there is no support whatsoever. I wouldn’t dare jump in this! It is also EXTREMELY thin and if I were able to wear it I would have to put pads in.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I hate wires and padding and tight straps so this was exactly what I was looking for to wear with my off-the-shoulder tops. The material could be thicker, maybe an extra layer? Cause you can kinda see my nipple prints when I wear it but oh well. It does its job and not to mention it’s very pretty 😇 I’ll probably get more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best strapless bra. I don't have a very large chest, but I'm not a small woman. This bra stayed just wear I put it without all the extra padding and hoopla that comes with traditional strapless bras. Worked great for a wedding I attended, and I danced all night with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Don’t size up!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews before purchasing and sized up due to recommendations. I am having to return it and get a smaller size. Could actually size down bc it gives so much. I am a 38 DDD/E and got the 40. Even on the first hook it wasn’t supportive enough bc there was too much room in the bust from the stretch material.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage, super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: There is no underwire in this, and that is something I’ve been looking for in a strapless. I am a 40d bra, I ordered a 42 and it is very comfortable. It is not lined, it will not push the girls up to your neck. However it is supportive and the five clasp back is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this strapless bra so much I just bought three more in every color they have The fit is really comfortable and it is true to size. I can wear these bras all day long and not have to keep pulling it back up that's a big plus for me I love to show off my tattoos by wearing alot of strapless tops and these bras fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Best half bra ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am large busted and have trouble finding a half bra that stays put and is comfortable. This one fit the bill! I could wear it to bed. I will say it has no coverage so I had to wear a snug camisol to avoid showing through my dress. But, it is the best half bra I ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Eisley Mac

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Even with large breast. 38DDD it actually worked!! I'm usually to big for strapless. And these girls are not where they used to be bahahaha
customer_reviews.author: Perfect Storm

customer_reviews.title: Great bra
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect like the picture, true to size. I’m a 40d and got 40, fit comfy just what I need during pregnancy at 32 weeks. Will wear under my maternity dress, but yes no shaping just your natural self. Kind of see through so I wouldn’t wear under anything else see through.
customer_reviews.author: DTH

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 44DD and the 44 fits perfectly. I was amazed at how well this holds me up considering the weight of my goods. It is by far the most comfortable strapless bra I have ever worn - no uncomfortable wires to dig in. This kept my girls in a natural looking shape and it doesn’t roll in the back like others I have tried. I am definitely ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Kayani Vannah

customer_reviews.title: bUY tHIS bRA
customer_reviews.text: THis is it!!! Comfortable, no tube boob or shelf boobs. I am a 38DD and the 40 was too big. I loved it so much I altered the 40 and ordered the correct size. Put it through some wear tests, including gardening and it stayed put. My breast are on the heavy side and this product was great.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie page

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a strapless bra that stays in place!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic strapless bra. I absolutely hate wearing a strapless bra because I seem to have to continually pull it up to keep it in place. This bra is not like that. It stays in place. I do wish they would make a padded version and a deeper cut for lower cut tops, but for most tops this bra will work perfectly and more importantly it stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2boys

customer_reviews.title: it fit, and I only needed it to stay ...
customer_reviews.text: it fit, and I only needed it to stay on for a couple hours, but it was more uncomfortable than I expected and the front kept rolling down. I wore it to a summer wedding and the material was not very breathable at all.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Stays up! Love the lace detail!
customer_reviews.text: Love this strapless bra. The lace detail is nice. I'm a 34DDD. Weight 135. It does not fall down during the day when wearing at all. I've found very few bras that stay put but this one is great! And it doesn't mash your breast but compliments the lift. I purchased one color and after receiving I loved it so much I got another. It was more money than other strapless bras but the lace detailing and how it stays put it's just an overall very good buy and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kesra

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit large.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 38 D and had to put this on the smallest setting. It’s still a bit loose. Should have ordered the 36. I don’t have sagging breasts, so this will work for what I have in mind, but a tighter fit would definitely be better for anyone with even a little sag.
customer_reviews.author: DogsR-Us

customer_reviews.title: Support is okay. Covers everything
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. I'm a 42DD. It covers everything with no spillage. This bra doesn't roll in the front or back. The lace detail in the front looks good if you have on a low cut top or dress. The support is okay. It's holding them up. But I wouldn't run any marathons or jump around. It's no underwire or pads inside.
customer_reviews.author: Aleshia

customer_reviews.title: Could've gone up two sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Band size 42 and B cup but ordered size 44 for the comfort factor around torso. Since there's no 'cups' I think even one more size up would've suited me better. Just wish all bras were made with breathable materials with a major focus on the band so it doesn't get itchy and sweaty when it's hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a strapless bra for the big chested ladies!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to wear under off the shoulder shirts and this was perfect. I bought a couple different kinds and this was hands-down the best one. I wear a 36DD and I bought the 38 and it fit perfectly, I rarely had to adjust it, maybe once and that was wearing it all day while touring charleston! Finally a strapless bra that stays up for all of us big chested ladies.
customer_reviews.author: James Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing on my husband's a count...I wear a 36 DDD and can't believe this fits so well I ordered a 36. It's doesn't hold the girls up, but it does hold them in place. Very comfortable! It's perfect under tops cut too low, I'll definitely be getting all the colors! I did laugh when I opened it because it looks super small, but it stretches! Just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Levi Gatsos

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Im always skeptical about buying bras before i try them on...but this bra is awesome..feels great on. Very comfortable. The lace in front looks sexy and can show with a v neck blouse as a under cami. Looks very nice and i absolutely love it...im ordering a couple more. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mitzy

customer_reviews.title: doesnt hold anything up
customer_reviews.text: i got a generous size, but still it is tight. i had hoped that i would at least be presentable in a string shoulder sun dress. i dont. i might as well wear nothing. it does feel like it would stay up, though. but higher up is where i needed it to be.
customer_reviews.author: marypatric

customer_reviews.title: Value Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I intentionally bought it larger but it comes larger then most bras. The circumstance isn't the issue because it has 3 hook & eye closure choices but I'm petite and the bra is almost 7-8 " when on. It's very stretchy and it covers almost 1/3 of my underarm (linear) to my hip line. The lace isn't pretty but if you just need that one strapless that no one will see, this is it. Comfortable, prices right and has the edging to prevent it from from falling off. Great for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Shelton

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well. Comfortable enough that sometimes I even forget I'm wearing it. I tried for so long to find a strapless bra that isn't padded or very expensive and FINALLY did with this one!!!! 💓 💓 Recommended VERY HIGHLY!! I intend to get other colors too!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a strapless bra that did not bind me and that would stay up. This one is perfect. I am a 38C and I got a 40 but I think the 38 would have worked too. The adjustable hooks on the back give me the option of tightening it. It gives me lift and is not tight. So happy that I ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

product_meta.title: Carole Martin Strapless Comfort Wireless Bra
feature_bullets: ★ WIRE FREE & Un-Padded with Low to Medium Support
★ 82% Nylon -18% Spandex Microfiber blend /Lace trim 91% Nylon/9% Spandex blend
★ Multi-directional s stretch fabric fits B, C and D cup sizes, cradles your body in total comfort giving you a silky smooth fit from all angles
★ Feel and look great in a superior strapless bra for women of all shapes and sizes
★ Ideal for as a summer casual bra or, for that special occasion
★ Available in primary colours White, Beige and Black
